titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Craig Thomas, a Senator from the State of Wyoming.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/5/2007--Passed House without amendment. Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Craig Thomas, a former Senator from Wyoming. Declares that when the House adjourns on June 5, 2007, it stand adjourned as a further mark of respect to the memory of Senator Thomas.
